name: Pump Kins: Return of the Joe
name_original: Pump Kins: Return of the Joe
description:
In this game, the goal is to gather ingredients for what seems to be a pumpkin spice latte and place them on the creepy pedestals outside your house before the pumpkin demon eats your soul and your farm. Some ingredients need to be gathered from cows or crafted at the crafting table. The rest can be found all over your farm. Can you appease the pumpkin demon in time?

WASD - move

E - interact with objects

H - bring up a hint

Esc - pause game

NOTE: v1.1 fixes the messed up UI.
